The money is also use for providing a better living for refugees in the war zones area.

Robinson  bills Chairman of all Ambassador  HAccra Ghana the transfer fund will commence to you to start the project in your country immediately And it will be well monitored by me H H.E. Robinson  bills Chairman of all Ambassador  chairman  all the ambassador in africa ,
So kindly fill the space below and return with your REGISTRATION BOOKING FEES  of $ 50  .ONLY  As our head office in New York is waiting to receive your detail information and the registration fee for them to get your name fully register as an Ambassador of the refugee before the process of your UN diplomatic passport, documents and funds for you to resume office in any country of your choice.

subject: Re:   UNITED NATIONS AFRICA ORGANI
body:
Dear Robinson bills,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I appreciate your dedication to helping the Africa refugee community. I understand that there have been some issues with scammers in Africa, and I'm glad to hear that you are working towards resolving these problems.

I have a few questions regarding the position of being an ambassador for the African refugees. Could you please provide more details about the responsibilities and duties that come with this role? How long is the term of office, and what kind of support will be provided to fulfill these responsibilities?

Additionally, you mentioned a booking fee. Could you please clarify what this fee is for and how it will contribute to my registration as an ambassador? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding before proceeding.

Thank you again for considering me for this position. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Chairman of all Ambassador
body:
Dear Chairman of all Ambassador,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my position as the United Nations Prime Minister of Refugees worldwide. I appreciate your recognition and support in this matter.

I must say, the opportunities and privileges you mentioned sound quite intriguing. However, before I proceed any further, I would like to gather more information about the process and requirements involved. Could you please provide me with some additional details?

1. How exactly will my position as the United Nations Prime Minister of Refugees worldwide be beneficial to both myself and my country?
2. What are the specific responsibilities and duties that come with this role?
3. Can you explain in more detail how the UN PRIVATE JETS work? Are they available for personal use or strictly for official purposes?
4. Regarding the payment of ambassadors to African refugees in Africa and Europe, how does that process work? Will I have direct control over these funds?
5. Could you clarify what is meant by "pending funds" and how they will be released to me as the United Nations Prime Minister without any delays?
6. What kind of diplomatic rights and privileges will I have with my UN DIPLOMATIC PASSPORT and UN ID? How will they benefit me in international affairs?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the AU ACCESS CARD you mentioned. What is its purpose, and why is it necessary for me to obtain it? Please provide more details on the cost involved as well.

I look forward to your prompt response so that we can proceed accordingly.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: UNITED NATIONS AFRICA ORGANI
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your email. I apologize for the late reply. I received your message from the UN Secretary General regarding my matter. I understand that the fees need to be sent first as soon as possible. Could you please provide me with more information about the fees and how to make the payment?

Also, I would like to know more about the process of becoming an ambassador to Africa Refugees in New York City. What are the responsibilities and duties associated with this role? And how long is the expected duration of this assignment?

Additionally, could you please clarify what you mean by "all your pending funds in Africa will be released within hours"? How exactly does that work?

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: from Ambassador bill Robinson
body:
Dear United Nations Security,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my position as the United Nations Prime Minister of Refugees worldwide. I appreciate your recognition and support in this matter. I am interested in learning more about the responsibilities and benefits that come with this role.

Could you please provide me with further details on how being a Prime Minister to the United Nations Refugees Worldwide will mandate the United States government and my country to respect my position? Additionally, I would like to know more about the direct communication I will have with organizations such as the United Nations High for Refugees, United States Department of State, African Union, Monetary Fund IMF, and Economic Community of West African States ECOWAS.

Regarding the registration process, could you explain why my name needs to be fully registered with a sum of USD at your United Nations head office in the USA? What are the specific benefits and privileges that come with this registration?

Furthermore, I would appreciate more information on obtaining UN diplomatic ID cards, UN yellow cards, UN tags, and UN access pass cards. How will these documents grant me access to loans in any country? Can you clarify how they relate to security matters and how they differ from those held by the UN Secretary General?

Lastly, I would like to understand why payment can only be sent through Western Union or Ria Money Transfer to your office in Nigeria. Is there a specific reason for this method? Could you provide me with more information about Emmanuel Odemero and Bill Robinson who are listed as receivers for these payments?

Thank you for your time and assistance. I look forward to receiving your response.

Best wishes,
James
